description: OpenAI is a research organization that aims to develop and direct artificial intelligence (AI) in ways that benefit humanity as a whole.
name: openai
title: OpenAI

properties.description: A list of messages comprising the conversation so far.
properties.name: messages
properties.label: Messages

properties.description: The contents of the message.
properties.name: content
properties.label: Content

properties.description: The role of the messages author
properties.name: role
properties.label: Role

properties.description: An optional name for the participant. Provides the model information to differentiate between participants of the same role.
properties.name: name
properties.label: Name

properties.description: Text-to-Speech model which will generate the audio.
properties.name: model
properties.label: Model

properties.description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.
properties.name: frequencyPenalty
properties.label: Frequency penalty

properties.description: Modify the likelihood of specified tokens appearing in the completion.
properties.name: logitBias
properties.label: Logit bias

properties.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate in the chat completion.
properties.name: maxTokens
properties.label: Max tokens

properties.description: How many chat completion choices to generate for each input message.
properties.name: n
properties.label: Number of chat completion choices

properties.description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics.
properties.name: presencePenalty
properties.label: Presence penalty

properties.description: Up to 4 sequences where the API will stop generating further tokens.
properties.name: stop
properties.label: Stop

properties.description: Controls randomness:  Higher values will make the output more random, while lower values like will make it more focused and deterministic.
properties.name: temperature
properties.label: Temperature

properties.description: An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling,  where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens comprising the top 10% probability mass are considered.
properties.name: topP
properties.label: Top p

properties.description: A unique identifier representing your end-user, which can help OpenAI to monitor and detect abuse.
properties.name: user
properties.label: User

actions.description: Create an assistant with a model and instructions.
actions.name: createAssistant

properties.description: Text-to-Speech model which will generate the audio.
properties.name: model
properties.label: Model

properties.description: The name of the assistant.
properties.name: name
properties.label: Name

properties.description: The description of the assistant.
properties.name: description
properties.label: Description

properties.description: The system instructions that the assistant uses.
properties.name: instructions
properties.label: Instructions

properties.description: A list of tool enabled on the assistant.
properties.name: tools
properties.label: Tools

properties.description: The type of tool being defined.
properties.name: type
properties.label: Type

properties.description: A description of what the function does, used by the model to choose when and how to call the function.
properties.name: description
properties.label: Description

properties.description: The name of the function to be called.
properties.name: name
properties.label: Name

properties.description: The parameters the functions accepts, described as a JSON Schema object.
properties.name: parameters
properties.label: Parameters

properties.description: A list of file IDs attached to this assistant.
properties.name: fileIds
properties.label: File ids

properties.description: Set of 16 key-value pairs that can be attached to an object. This can be useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured format. Keys can be a maximum of 64 characters long and values can be a maxium of 512 characters long.
properties.name: metadata
properties.label: Metadata

actions.title: Create assistant

actions.description: Create an image using text-to-image models
actions.name: createImage

properties.description: Text-to-Speech model which will generate the audio.
properties.name: model
properties.label: Model

properties.description: The quality of the image that will be generated.
properties.name: quality
properties.label: Quality

properties.description: The format in which the generated images are returned.
properties.name: responseFormat
properties.label: Response format

properties.description: The size of the generated images.
properties.name: size
properties.label: Size

properties.description: The style of the generated images.
properties.name: style
properties.label: Style

properties.description: A unique identifier representing your end-user, which can help OpenAI to monitor and detect abuse.
properties.name: user
properties.label: User

actions.title: Create image

actions.description: Generate an audio recording from the input text
actions.name: createSpeech

properties.description: Text-to-Speech model which will generate the audio.
properties.name: model
properties.label: Model

properties.description: The text to generate audio for.
properties.name: input
properties.label: Input

properties.description: The voice to use when generating the audio.
properties.name: voice
properties.label: Voice

properties.description: The format to audio in.
properties.name: responseFormat
properties.label: Response format

properties.description: The speed of the generated audio.
properties.name: speed
properties.label: Speed

actions.title: Create speech

actions.description: Transcribes audio into the input language.
actions.name: createTranscription

properties.description: The audio file object to transcribe, in one of these formats: flac, mp3, mp4, mpeg, mpga, m4a, ogg, wav, or webm.
properties.name: file
properties.label: File

properties.description: Text-to-Speech model which will generate the audio.
properties.name: model
properties.label: Model

properties.description: The language of the input audio.
properties.name: language
properties.label: Language

properties.description: An optional text to guide the model's style or continue a previous audio segment. The prompt should match the audio language.
properties.name: prompt
properties.label: Prompt

properties.description: The format of the transcript output
properties.name: responseFormat
properties.label: Response format

properties.description: The sampling temperature, between 0 and 1. Higher values like will make the output more random, while lower values will make it more focused and deterministic.
properties.name: temperature
properties.label: Temperature

actions.title: Create transcriptions

properties.description: The audio file object translate, in one of these formats: flac, mp3, mp4, mpeg, mpga, m4a, ogg, wav, or webm.
properties.name: file
properties.label: File

properties.description: Text-to-Speech model which will generate the audio.
properties.name: model
properties.label: Model

properties.description: An optional text to guide the model's style or continue a previous audio segment. The prompt should be in English.
properties.name: prompt
properties.label: Prompt

properties.description: The format of the transcript output
properties.name: responseFormat
properties.label: Response format

properties.description: The sampling temperature, between 0 and 1. Higher values like will make the output more random, while lower values will make it more focused and deterministic.
properties.name: temperature
properties.label: Temperature

properties.label: Content

properties.description: Specifies the detail level of the image.
